content: @Grahame Grieve How do I get around the complaining of the IGpublisher when I'm using the code NNDNK from the code system of http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203 (https://terminology.hl7.org/1.0.0/CodeSystem-v2-0203.html) - QA report is here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-core/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-NVOJ0X_repo_input_resources_namingsystem-ssn
According to the spec of the code, the value is legit
the current source for the table is here: http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203/index.html
I'll add you to the list of people waiting for me to get UTG working for implementation guides
don't know. people keep showering me with that stuff that's broken
How about getting more people and resources to help fix stuff?
